As previously stated this is a compulsory

318.26.text:
unit for students who are working towards
the full GCSE. (For students working on the

325.01.text:
short course, Unit 6 is completed instead.)
Unit 1 is an objective test multiple choice

334.28.text:
examination worth 40 marks. The examination
is 45 minutes and is available once each year.

343.20.text:
Students have one opportunity to sit the examination.
This is the year they complete the course

350.81.text:
(typically Year 11). No re-sits are available.
The focus is mainly on AO1 and AO2.

380.82.text:

388.66.text:
and students being aware of how objective
test questions are designed. In terms of the

395.92.text:

403.63.text:

where a question asks for 2 correct answers

412.00.text:

are required there are 6 options.
